message: As an attorney, your time is precious. So how do you make the most of it? Learning effective time management is the key. In our upcoming webinar, join us as we guide you through how to best manage your time to improve your quality of life both personally and professionally.

Join our guest speaker Chris Earley as he shares how to most effectively manage your time to best optimize your practice and your life. Effective Time Management for Attorneys begins promptly at 3 p.m. ET/12 p.m. PT on Wednesday February 28th.
bottomline: Seats are limited, so reserve yours today!
